metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1547 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows BackupEngine improperly handles memory.To exploit this vulnerability, an attackerwould first have to gain execution on the victim system, aka 'WindowsBackup Engine Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is uniquefrom CVE-2020-1535, CVE-2020-1536, CVE-2020-1539, CVE-2020-1540,CVE-2020-1541, CVE-2020-1542, CVE-2020-1543, CVE-2020-1544, CVE-2020-1545,CVE-2020-1546, CVE-2020-1551.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1547` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.27-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
mariadb-10.1 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
